subject: Re: radio shack box
author: northernilghosthuntingteam
full_text:
Thanks for your input Suzane. Im gald people are trying to help me 
with different options. I have tried esnips and after a week I wanted 
to throw esnips out the window....it took me almost 10 tries just to 
get an account without errors and tyring to make a folder was the 
same. Then uploading into the folder had various errors. Reading 
forums in esnips it states that they changed "management" and that 
some things weren't running best but to be patient. I tried but I 
wansnt even able to post in the forums to ask for help. I emailed 
support 4 times without a response. I was told that esnips is good by 
some people and that they have never had trobles. As far as this 
particular clip its the first time I have saved an audio file as mp3. 
It dose play on my computer and it plays for me online but Im 
wondering if changing the format has anything to do with why it wont 
play for anyone esle.

and

session
